## R-Ladies Brisbane

::: columns
::: {.column width="17%"}
<p float="left">

[![](images/rladies.jpg){fig-alt="RLadies Logo" width="100%"}](https://github.com/rladies/meetup-presentations_brisbane)

</p>
:::

::: {.column width="3%"}
<!-- empty column to create gap -->
:::

::: {.column width="80%"}
R-Ladies Brisbane welcomes members of all R proficiency levels. The community is designed to develop our members' R skills & knowledge through social, collaborative learning & sharing. Supporting minority identity access to STEM skills & careers, the Free Software Movement, and contributing to the global R community!

|     **When**: Find their events on [MeetUP](https://www.meetup.com/rladies-brisbane/)

|     **Where**: Online and in Person.

|     **More Details**: The [R Ladies Brisbane GitHub](https://github.com/rladies/meetup-presentations_brisbane)
:::
:::

## Hacky Hour UQ

::: columns
::: {.column width="17%"}
<p float="left">

[![](images/uqhackyhour.png){fig-alt="UQ Hack Hour" width="100%"}](https://rcc.uq.edu.au/meetups#hacky-hour)

</p>
:::

::: {.column width="3%"}
<!-- empty column to create gap -->
:::

::: {.column width="80%"}
For UQ researchers to get support with research-related technical issues.

|     **When**: Weekly on Tuesdays, 3pm--4pm (AEST)

|     **Where**: Online. For Zoom meeting details please email rcc-support\@uq.edu.au

|     **More Details**: The [RCC Hacky Hour UQ website](https://rcc.uq.edu.au/meetups#hacky-hour)
:::
:::

## The GeoSpatial Community

::: columns
::: {.column width="17%"}
<p float="left">

[![](images/turkeypin.svg){fig-alt="GeoSpatial Community Logo" width="100%"}](https://brisbane-geocommunity.netlify.app/)

</p>
:::

::: {.column width="3%"}
<!-- empty column to create gap -->
:::

::: {.column width="80%"}
A monthly geospatial skill sharing tutorial sessions where a member of the community shares their skills, experiences and tricks in a friendly and inclusive environment.

|     **When**: Around the last Thursday of the month in the afternoon.

|     **Where**: Online. For meeting details please email geocommunity \@ gmail dot com

|     **More Details**: The [GeoSpatial Community website](https://brisbane-geocommunity.netlify.app/)
:::
:::

## QUT/UQ Office Hours

::: columns
::: {.column width="17%"}
<p float="left">

[![](images/ado.png){fig-alt="Australia Digital Observatory Logo" width="100%"}](https://www.digitalobservatory.net.au/office-hours/)

</p>
:::

::: {.column width="3%"}
<!-- empty column to create gap -->
:::

::: {.column width="80%"}
For Australian researchers working with linguistics, text analytics, digital and computational methods, social media and web archives to bring their technical questions, research problems and rough ideas and get advice and feedback.

|     **When**: Fortnightly on Tuesdays, 2pm--3pm **AEDT** (1pm AEST).

|     **Where**: Online. For Zoom meeting details please [register to attend here](https://qut.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZEvcOqrrjkvHNH2ZqG5yed7Gh15Rp19Vatm).

|     **More Details**: The [Australian Digital Observatory website](https://www.digitalobservatory.net.au/office-hours/).
:::
:::
